creator: a.brazhnyk@biconsulting.ws
text:
compression filter returns inapropriate Writer when encoding different then 
system default is used in servlet. I fixed the problem since its easy and going 
to send a patch tommorow (hoping cvs will be up and running tommorow :) )

creator: a.brazhnyk@biconsulting.ws

Patch to fix problem
